headline: CoreWeave & Core Scientific, Netflix, Chime: Trending Tickers
summary: CoreWeave (CRWV) stock is in focus after the company announced a $9 billion deal to acquire Core Scientific (CORZ). Seaport analysts downgraded Netflix (NFLX) to Hold from Buy, citing concerns about the timing of the company's new plans for ad revenue, user features, and more. Several investment groups initiated coverage of Chime (CHYM) with nine Buy ratings, five Holds, and one Sell. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Tesla, Nvidia, Core Scientific, WNS, Netflix, Shell, and More
